members.signatureBeforeChange: int itemDataProc (int browser, int id, int property, int itemData, int setValue)
members.signatureAfterChange: int itemDataProc (int browser, int id, int property, int itemData, int setValue)
diff: +				* Bug in the Macintosh. When the height of the row is smaller than the
+				* check box, the tail of the check mark draws outside of the item part
+				* bounds. This means it will not be redrawn when the item is unckeched.
+				* The fix is to redraw the area.
